description: Two-way synchronization of PC contacts, calendar, tasks and memos to webOS devices. Direct and secure sync via USB cable for Microsoft Outlook, Palm Desktop, Lotus Notes, ACT!, Salesforce.com, Zoho CRM, and other CRM or contact management databases. Contacts and calendar use Palm Synergy. CL USB Sync contains CL Tasks and CL Memo apps with categories, priorities, and sort options. PC synchronization requires CompanionLink software (starts at $49.95, one-time license fee) from www.companionlink.com/webos. Free phone support included.  Works with all HP TouchPad, Veer, Pre, and Pixi devices.  English, French, German, Spanish.
